Question: Hailo CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Hailo

Product: Edge AI Technology at CES 2024

- Hailo-8 AI accelerators and Hailo-15 AI vision processors
- Perform data center-class AI processing directly on edge devices
- Hailo-15 delivers advanced video processing and analytics at the edge
- Hailo-8 offers high-performance AI processing, including the Hailo-8 Century PCIe card line and Hailo-8L for entry-level applications
- Demonstrations of edge AI technology in smart cameras, security, video management systems, automotive solutions, and AI-enabled video enhancement
- Applications in video management systems, advanced driver assistance systems, autonomous driving, and security
- Integration with various partner solutions for real-world applications
- High accuracy, low latency, and reduced power consumption
- Emphasis on high-performance deep learning and AI processing for edge devices
Summary_cn:
Hailo

产品：2024年国际消费电子展（CES）的边缘人工智能技术

- Hailo-8人工智能加速器和Hailo-15人工智能视觉处理器
- 在边缘设备上直接进行数据中心级别的人工智能处理
- Hailo-15在边缘实现先进的视频处理和分析功能
- Hailo-8提供高性能的人工智能处理能力，包括Hailo-8 Century PCIe卡系列和面向入门级应用的Hailo-8L
- 展示智能摄像头、安全、视频管理系统、汽车解决方案和人工智能增强视频等边缘人工智能技术的示范
- 应用于视频管理系统、先进驾驶辅助系统、自动驾驶和安全领域
- 与多种合作伙伴解决方案进行集成，实现真实应用场景
- 高准确性、低延迟和降低能源消耗
- 着重于为边缘设备提供高性能深度学习和人工智能处理能力
